data.name: Gorenje | PP | Was die Küchenmaschine alles kann
data.notes:
Some Raw Material: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1pVosWfjLU2DhHhDUlqP3vM7S0tY8N8Ku?usp=drive_link
Please use different materials of all the Küchenmaschine videos → you can freely chose → look at the inspiration video

VoiceOver is also here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1pVosWfjLU2DhHhDUlqP3vM7S0tY8N8Ku?usp=drive_link

Inspiration: https://www.tiktok.com/@siobhanamccaffrey/video/7460312372176031022?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc&web_id=7597382535739688468

Context: We are showing the features of the Küchenmaschine (Kitchen aid). 
Show different use cases.

Special requirements:
    No subtitles
    Please choose fitting Musik for the Video from TikTok commercial library and link them here.
    Placeholder-Supertext on Screen: Meine Küchenmaschine

General requirements:
    Translate it into your own language so the videos can be edited logically
    Text as always → centered, same size and same positioning
    Keep only interesting and engaging content in the video → always keep in mind: we edit for social media → short attention span
    stabilize all footage → no shaky footage

data.name: Gorenje | PP | Wieso slow Juicer der bessere Juicer ist
Gorenje | PP | High Protein Pasta
data.notes:
Raw Material: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1rmYkN0jvqKfv_4SN2eV7e1OgW34dMWis
Inspiration: https://www.tiktok.com/@chloeevegan/video/7394575677132999943 

Must-have requirements:
The video should be about 32 seconds long. Please show the final result at the beginning. Then show the ingredients as they are mixed and the final result.
Video 1078 is the VoiceOver for orientation. (You can transcribe it to your mother language in Premiere for better understanding during editing)
The Video doesn't need subtitles.

2871 - Ingredients

2874 - blend

2889 - creator with pasta
2896 - clickbait tofu on the pasta
